org.openscience.cdk.graph.invariant

Class MorganNumbersTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.graph.invariant.MorganNumbersTools

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.graph.invariant.MorganNumbersToolsTest")
public class MorganNumbersTools
extends Object
    Compute the extended connectivity values (Morgan Numbers) [Morgan, H.L., The Generation of a Unique Machine Description for Chemical Structures - A Technique Developed at Chemical Abstracts Service., J.Chem.Doc., 1965, 5:107-113]. The tool does not produce the lexicographic smallest labelling on the graph and should not be used as a robust canonical labelling tool. To canonical label a graph please use InChINumbersTools or CanonicalLabeler. To determine equivalent classes of atoms please use HuLuIndexTool or one of the discrete refines available in the 'cdk-group' module.
    Author:
    shk3
    See Also:
    InChINumbersTools, CanonicalLabeler, HuLuIndexTool
    Keywords:
    Morgan number
    Created on:
    2003-06-30
    Belongs to CDK module:
    standard
    Source code:
    master

    • Method Detail

      • getMorganNumbers

        @TestMethod(value="testGetMorganNumbers_IAtomContainer")
public static long[] getMorganNumbers(IAtomContainer molecule)
        Makes an array containing the morgan numbers of the atoms of atomContainer. These number are the extended connectivity values and not the lexicographic smallest labelling on the graph.
        Parameters:
        molecule - the molecule to analyse.
        Returns:
        The morgan numbers value.

      • getMorganNumbersWithElementSymbol

        @TestMethod(value="testPhenylamine")
public static String[] getMorganNumbersWithElementSymbol(IAtomContainer atomContainer)
        Makes an array containing the morgan numbers+element symbol of the atoms of atomContainer. This method puts the element symbol before the morgan number, useful for finding out how many different rests are connected to an atom.
        Parameters:
        atomContainer - The atomContainer to analyse.
        Returns:
        The morgan numbers value.
